verses.1: Dai dide-in Pasian bek ka ngak a, ama hong hotkhiat ding muangin ka om hi.
verses.2: Kei hong huhpa le hong honpa amah bek hi a, ka guallel ngei kei ding hi.
verses.3: Note khempeuh in kawm a hoi tawh a kibang, gawl bangin a kiliing mi khat a susia dingin bang tanvei hih huan nilohin, susia ding na hi uh hiam?
verses.4: Amah a za liatna panin suk niam ding bekbek amaute in a sawm uh hi. Amaute in thuman lo ah nuamsa mahmah uh hi. Amaute in a kampi uh tawh phat khem uh a, ahih hangin a sung tawng uh ah samsiat uh hi.
verses.5: Amah bek ka muan ahih manin, daitakin Pasian bek ka ngak hi.
verses.6: Kei hong hupa le hong honpa amah bek mah hi a, ka guallel ngei kei ding hi.
verses.7: Keima suahtakna le ka minphatna Pasian始 hang ahi hi. A muanhuai ka belh pa, ka bukna Pasian ahi hi.
verses.8: Mite aw, amah muang tawntung unla, na lungkhamna teng uh ama tungah gen un. Pasian, eite始 bukna ahi hi.
verses.9: Mihingte ahihleh husan bang bek hi a, a lian a neu kibang lel hi. Tawi a kikhai ciangin amaute in leek lo uh a, amaute a kigawmin husan sangin zang zaw hi.
verses.10: Zawhthawh thu tawh ngahna muanin nei kei inla, suh gawpnate lametin nei kei in. Na hauhna a khan leh, tuate muanin nei kei in.
verses.11: Vangliatna pen keima a始 hi, ci-in Pasian in a genna ka zak ngeingei sa ahi hi.
verses.12: Topa aw, itna kip nangma a始 ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a sepna bang ciatin mite na thuk hi.
